sentence.Network_en: All the teachers abominate cheating in examinations.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有教师都憎恶考试作弊.

sentence.Network_en: It has been my tragedy that I abominate the English countryside.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不喜欢英格兰农村,这一直是我的不幸.

sentence.Network_en: As a son - in - law , I abominate you.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为一个 女婿, 我讨厌你.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 赵丽——GRE词汇课 - 豆丁网 ... abolish slavery polish 抛光 （复习 ）  abominate 痛恨 an abominable affair 丑事.
心理学词典 - 豆丁网 ... ABO blood group ABO ABO system ABO abolition of reflex 反射消失 abominate 厌恶 abomination 厌恶.
abolition n．废除，革除abominate v．痛恨，痛恶abominable adj．可厌的，天气极坏的

list.abs: much sand blown by wind of line , big gradient , Gao Hai is dialed , big difference in temperature , use a condition abominable .沿线多风沙、大坡度、高海拨、大温差，运用条件恶劣。

seldom count a communist to lead a cadre to return the action that add fuel to the fire reached since amid especially , damaged the image of the party , caused abominable social effect .尤其是极少数共产党员领导干部还在其中起到了推波助澜的作用，损害了党的形象，造成了恶劣的社会影响。
murder is the most abominable crime ., 凶杀是最可恶的犯罪.
The judge said it was the most abominable crime he had ever heard of ., 法官说这是他平生所听说过的最可恶的罪行.
The judge described attack as an abominable crime ., 法官称那次袭击为令人发指的罪行.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin abominat- 'deprecated', from the verb abominari, from ab- 'away, from' + omen, omin- 'omen'

auth_sentence.content: I abominate your goody-goody, circumspect, infallibly-proper young lady.
